channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Swift for Ubuntu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Swift for Ubuntu

item.title: CVE-2019-8790|2024-08-04T21:31:36.831Z -- apple -- swift%20for%20ubuntu
item.description: This issue was addresses by updating incorrect URLSession file descriptors management logic to match Swift 5.0. This issue is fixed in Swift 5.1.1 for Ubuntu. Incorrect management of file descriptors in URLSession could lead to inadvertent data disclosure.
